MajorClaims.MC1: I would prefer to live in an apartment in the community rather than in the university dormitories
MajorClaims.MC2: the advantages of living in an apartment outshine those of living in a dormitory

Claims.C1: an apartment provides a lot more freedom than a dormitory
Claims.C3: the studying conditions are better in an apartment

Premises.P1: While in a dormitory you have to obey preset rules, in the apartment you set your own rules
Premises.P2: You are free to have visits at any time or to be left alone if you want
Premises.P4: you can choose to have your own room instead of sharing with another student
Premises.P5: you also get more space than you would in a dormitory
Premises.P6: you could rent the extra rooms in the apartment to other people and rent would be a lot cheaper
Premises.P7: Transportation is another issue, you have to go to and return from the university everyday
Premises.P8: You could choose to use public transportation, a cheaper option, or to have a car
Premises.P9: The car is an expensive option, but also offers freedom of schedule and destination
Premises.P10: you don't have all the noise and distractions that you often have in dormitories
Premises.P11: A lot of students often complain about their roommate playing music too loud or bringing friends over at inappropriate times
Premises.P12: you would be able to concentrate better
Premises.P13: in an apartment you don't have a roommate
Premises.P15: you won't have a problem if you are the one who wants to play music, bring friends over, or study late at night
Premises.P17: living in a dormitory, and being surrounded by students also has some advantages, like being able to get help with any academic issues from them
